author: djspiewak
msg: * Reimplemented Scala.version to give preference to scala.version, then read library.properties (avoiding RJB)
* Altered compiler precedence to prefer scala.version over SCALA_HOME
* Use SCALA_HOME when scala.version points to the same version (to allow FSC)
